lexical_sophistication.avg_zipf_frequency: Average Zipf frequency (wordfreq) for content words
lexical_sophistication.rare_word_rate: Proportion of content words with Zipf < 3.5

readability_notes.dale_chall: Proxy using wordfreq Zipf >= 4 as 'easy' words (not the official Dale-Chall list).
readability_notes.syllables: Syllables estimated with pyphen (offline), not CMUdict.

clinical_lexicon_notes.clinical_term_density_per_1k: Matches per 1k words against the provided clinical lexicon.
clinical_lexicon_notes.clinical_term_rate: Matches per word against the provided clinical lexicon.
